about_the_game:
A Game Where Only Achievements Matter!

Complete the Most Unusual Challenges

No levels, no enemies, no story – just achievements. Launch the game on a specific day of the week or team up with friends to unlock the rarest ones. Some are obvious, while others require creativity.

Test Your Luck and Cleverness

Some achievements call for teamwork, while others demand out-of-the-box thinking. Can you figure out all the conditions and collect the full set of achievements?

Simple Yet Addictive

A minimalist interface and pure challenge – everything you need for a fun and engaging experience. Track your progress and compete with other players on the global leaderboard – who will be the first to unlock all achievements?

name: 17 RANDOM ACHIEVEMENTS
short_description: Your only goal is to collect all the achievements. But that may not be as easy as it seems.....
